short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export LinkedIn data: Company Followers, Personal Followers, and Personal Following

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ü¶à LeadShark - LinkedIn Follower Exporter: Turn your Followers into Customers! üöÄ

Our Chrome extension is designed to help businesses, marketers, and LinkedIn power users effortlessly extract valuable follower data from their company pages, and personal profiles. Capture essential follower data such as: Name, Headline, Profile URL (and Follow Date for company).

üîë Key Features:
‚úÖ Export LinkedIn company followers
‚úÖ Export LinkedIn profile followers 
‚úÖ Export LinkedIn profile following

üöÄ Why Choose LeadShark?

1. Supercharge Your Lead Generation:
Transform your LinkedIn followers into valuable leads! LeadShark empowers you to create targeted marketing campaigns, personalized outreach strategies, and data-driven business decisions.

2. Save Time and Boost Productivity:
LeadShark automates the impossible process of exporting your follower information, allowing you to focus on what really matters ‚Äì growing your business and building relationships.

3. Gain Valuable Insights:
Understand your audience like never before. Analyze follower trends, identify key influencers, and tailor your content strategy to maximize engagement and growth both for your company page, and your personal LinkedIn page.

4. User-Friendly and Customizable:
LeadShark's intuitive interface makes exporting followers a breeze. Adjust scroll speed, pause and resume as needed, and export data at any time ‚Äì you're in complete control.

5. Secure and Compliant:
LeadShark operates with utmost respect for LinkedIn's terms of service and user privacy. Your data and your followers' information are not stored anywhere on the cloud.

üéØ Perfect for:
‚Ä¢ Marketing professionals seeking to enhance their LinkedIn strategies
‚Ä¢ Sales teams looking to expand their network and generate leads
‚Ä¢ Recruiters aiming to connect with potential candidates
‚Ä¢ Entrepreneurs and small business owners growing their professional network
‚Ä¢ Social media managers analyzing follower demographics and trends

üí° How It Works:
1. Navigate to your company's LinkedIn page or your Network page.
2. For company: open the followers list, and click on "Show all followers"
3. Click the purple LeadShark icon in your browser
4. Hit "Export Followers" (stay on the current tab while exporting)
5. Download your CSV file with valuable follower data

Don't let your LinkedIn followers remain just numbers on a screen. Turn them into actionable leads and meaningful connections with LeadShark - LinkedIn Follower Exporter!

üöÄ Install now and dive into a sea of opportunities! ü¶à

---

‚ö†Ô∏è You need to be a company admin on LinkedIn to download company followers.

Keywords: LinkedIn, follower exporter, lead generation, marketing tool, CSV export, company page, personal followers, social media analytics, networking, Chrome extension, data extraction, B2B marketing, sales leads, recruiter tool, LinkedIn automation, professional networking

Note: Please use this tool responsibly and in compliance with LinkedIn's terms of service and privacy policies. LeadShark Company Follower Exporter is designed to collect and export your company's followers only (you need to be a company admin), and it is not for *every* company.

---

Privacy Policy & Terms of Use:
LeadShark respects your privacy and operates in full compliance with data protection regulations. We do not store or access any of your LinkedIn data. All information is processed locally on your device and is only used for the purpose of exporting your company's follower list as requested by you. By using LeadShark, you agree to comply with LinkedIn's terms of service and to use the exported data responsibly and ethically.

For support or inquiries, please contact us through our official support channels or visit our website. Happy exporting! üåÄ
